task: Develop an advanced simulation training system for urban emergency preparedness, focusing on integrating real-time data analytics, machine learning models, VR training modules, multi-agent simulations, collaboration platforms, and decision-making frameworks. The system should include modules for logistical planning, crisis communication strategies, infrastructure resilience, and emergency response evaluation. It should offer multilingual user support and provide real-time feedback and analytics dashboards.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Primary interface to communicate with the user for developing the training system.

agents.name: simulation_training_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Oversees the creation and integration of all components of the simulation training system.

agents.name: data_analysis_specialist_agent
agents.role: Focuses on integrating real-time data and analytics into the system.

agents.name: real_time_data_provider_agent
agents.role: Supplies real-time data integrations for analytics.

agents.name: data_integration_manager_agent
agents.role: Manages data flows and integrations for the analytics system.

agents.name: ml_modeling_expert_agent
agents.role: Develops and integrates machine learning models for emergency response predictions.

agents.name: emergency_response_evaluator_agent
agents.role: Evaluates and optimizes machine learning models for emergency scenarios.

agents.name: vr_training_developer_agent
agents.role: Designs and implements virtual reality training modules.

agents.name: training_content_creator_agent
agents.role: Creates content for VR simulation scenarios.

agents.name: collaboration_platform_manager_agent
agents.role: Manages platforms for collaborative training and planning.

agents.name: crisis_communication_planner_agent
agents.role: Develops crisis communication strategies integrated into the platform.

agents.name: infrastructure_resilience_expert_agent
agents.role: Ensures the simulation system considers infrastructure resilience.

agents.name: multilingual_support_agent
agents.role: Provides multilingual assistance for simulation system users.

agents.name: logistics_planning_agent
agents.role: Plans the logistics for emergency training and resource distribution.

agents.name: supply_chain_manager_agent
agents.role: Manages supply chains and ensures efficient resource allocation during the training.

agents.name: policy_advisor_agent
agents.role: Provides strategic policy advice to enhance the effectiveness of the training system.

agents.name: risk_assessment_specialist_agent
agents.role: Assesses risk factors and scenarios to improve emergency preparedness strategies.

agents.name: training_feedback_analyst_agent
agents.role: Analyzes feedback from training participants to refine and optimize simulation modules.

agents.name: community_outreach_agent
agents.role: Engages with the community to ensure training relevance and inclusivity.

tools.name: analytics_dashboard_tool
tools.description: Provides real-time analytics and feedback for the training system.

data_source_mapping.description: Identifier for data sources integrated into the dashboard.

tools.name: ml_training_tool
tools.description: Facilitates the training and evaluation of machine learning models for emergency responses.

model_id.description: Identifier for the machine learning model being trained.

tools.name: vr_simulation_tool
tools.description: Creates virtual reality scenarios for immersive training.

user_engagement_level.description: Level of user engagement in the VR environment.

tools.name: communication_strategy_tool
tools.description: Develops and optimizes communication strategies for crisis scenarios.

tools.name: logistical_analysis_tool
tools.description: Analyzes logistical components and infrastructure resilience.

tools.name: language_service_tool
tools.description: Provides translation and language support for users.

languages_supported.description: List of languages the service supports.

tools.name: resource_distribution_tool
tools.description: Optimizes the distribution of resources during emergency training.

resource_id.description: Identifier for the resources to be distributed.

distribution_channels.description: Channels through which resources are distributed.
